data.name: Type exchange
data.xml_template:
<route id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}" />
    <setHeader name="InputFormat">
        <constant>
            {{input_format}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="OutputFormat">
        <constant>
            {{output_format}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    {{applyUnmarshal input_format input_format_options}}
    {{#if (eq input_format "base64")}}
        {{applyUnmarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{/if}}
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    <multicast>
        {{#each target}}
        <to uri="direct:{{this}}"/>
        {{/each}}
    </multicast>
</route>
